main_definition: Low can refer to a position that is close to the ground, having little height or elevation, or being of lesser quality, amount, intensity, or importance.

meanings_and_examples.example: The puppy crawled on all fours toward the low table.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Low in height, quantity, or level
meanings_and_examples.example: She wore a dress that was low-cut at the front.
The movie received low ratings from critics.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Low in pitch, volume, or tone
meanings_and_examples.example: His voice was so low that it was difficult to hear him.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Below average level of performance or achievement
meanings_and_examples.example: The team's low score meant they did not qualify for the next round.
